name: WRC 6 FIA World Rally Championship
description: On a race track, the car makes all the difference. In a rally, it's the driver. Fog, mud, punctures... you have to deal with it all. WRC 6 includes all of the official 2016 content, 11 Super Special Stages on a 1:1 scale, local split-screen multiplayer and free access to the entire 2017 eSports WRC.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® 7 64bits Processor: Intel® Core i3 / AMD Phenom™ II X2 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 650 / AMD Radeon™ HD 7750 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 20 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Soundcard
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows® 10 64bits Processor: Intel® Core i5 / AMD FX 8150 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 780 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 2 GB DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 20 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Soundcard
